casebody.data:
AMERICAN OIL CORPORATION v. JOHN R. WATERS CO. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. December 22, 1921.) No. 103. In Error to the District Court of the United States for the Southern District of New York. Action by the American Oil Corporation against the John R. Waters Company. Judgment for defendant, and plaintiff brings error. Affirmed. PiuKler & Mcintire, of Now York City, for plaintiff in error. T. Ludlow Chrystie, of New York City, for defendant in error.

Before HOUGH, MAN-TON, and MAYER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
